title: A letter to the Earle of Pembroke from Sir Edvvard Baynton in Glocester shewing the true manner how himselfe and Captaine Edward Eyre were surprised at Malmsbury by two lieutenant collonels under the Earl of Stamfords command upon pretended ground and contrary to some scandalous relations in print ; with the reasons inducing him formerly to seize upon Sir Edward Hungerford.
author: Baynton, Edward, Sir, 1618?-1679.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
